page.title: 18LEISURE TIME
page.content: Leisure time is very important, I enjoy playing pool, snooker, football, bike riding and running. Rounders is a good game as well, you need a bat, a ball and some posts. I enjoy watching television and watching birds. I like watching television because it is entertaining. I like Benny Hill best as a commedian because he is a fat little chubby man. I like drawing cartoon characters. At first I wasn't very good at drawing but I have got better and better in my fourth year. The 800 metres run is a hard race, it is very tiring, the first time I ran I thought I was going to snap my legs off. Football is my best sport because it is the longest game I've ever had and I've always liked football, I have been playing football since I was six now I am eleven years of age. {TERRY CASSELL
